meanings.sent1: She kept mistouching the screen, causing it to malfunction.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was mistouching the piano keys and corrected his hand position.
meanings.sent3: The robot mistouching the buttons made for a comical scene in the movie.
meanings.sent4: Her mistouching of the delicate vase was like a bull in a china shop.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of mistouching the wires could be dangerous.

meanings.definition: The act of touching something incorrectly or inappropriately.
meanings.sent1: The mistouching of the painting left fingerprints all over the canvas.
meanings.sent2: He felt embarrassed by the mistouching of the sculpture in the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: The mistouching of the cake frosting resulted in a messy but tasty dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her mistouching of the sensitive topic caused tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The mistouching of the rare artifact was a costly mistake.
